TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in Split .

CARDINAL . The applicant was a holder of a specially protected tenancy on a flat in ORG . Under the legislation in force , all holders of specially protected tenancies were entitled to buy their flats under favourable terms , provided that they purchased CARDINAL flat . In DATE the applicant purchased that flat and subsequently donated it to her son .
CARDINAL . The applicant ’s late husband had a specially protected tenancy on another flat in ORG . He died in DATE , before he could exercise the right to purchase that flat .

CARDINAL . The applicant , as her husband ’s heir , instituted administrative proceedings for acknowledgment of her specially protected tenancy . Her tenancy on the second flat was acknowledged on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings in ORG ( PERSON ) , requesting the court to order GPE to conclude a flat purchase agreement with her .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed a motion for withdrawal of the first - instance judge . On DATE her motion was dismissed because there was no evidence that the judge was biased .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s claim . It found that the applicant had already bought CARDINAL flat as a holder of a specially protected tenancy and that she had no right to buy another one .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) dismissed the applicant ’s appeal for the same reasons .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant proposed to the competent ORG Attorney ’s ORG ( ORG odvjetništvo ) to file a motion for the protection of legality ( zahtjev za zaštitu zakonitosti ) , an extraordinary remedy under the domestic law . Her proposal was denied on DATE .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , on DATE the applicant also filed a constitutional complaint claiming that ORG and ORG , in their judgments of CARDINAL DATE and DATE , had violated her right to respect for home and property .

CARDINAL . The Government submit that throughout the proceedings the applicant was filing various submissions to ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) . In CARDINAL of them , a letter dated DATE , the applicant requested ORG to “ terminate all judicial actions and remand the case to the ORG ” . Further letters of the applicant , from DATE , consisted of rush notes .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed her complaint as ill - founded .

CARDINAL . The Specially Protected Tenancies ( Sale to Occupier ) Act ( Zakon o prodaji stanova na kojima postoji stanarsko pravo , Official Gazette no . CARDINAL with further amendments ) ( “ the LAW ” ) regulates the conditions of sale of flats let under specially protected tenancies . LAW entitles the holders of specially protected tenancies on publicly - owned flats to purchase such flats under favourable conditions , provided that each holder buys CARDINAL flat .
